robot_player.description: A client broker or other software proxy that represents a player of the game which is driven by an artifical intelligence of some kind.

human_player.description: A client broker or other software proxy that represents a human player of the game.

player_avatar.description: A client broker or other software proxy that represents an avatar in the game world that is driven by a human or robot player.

npc_avatar.description: A client broker or other software proxy that represents a non_player_driven avatar (a Non_Player Character) in the game world.

map_context_object.description: A client broker or other software proxy that represents a non_player object other than a NPC, in the game world. For example, a building, a tree, an organizational ledger, an automatic town crier, and so on..
